actions.description: The scion makes one attack using Lightning Sword or Hailstone, as well as two Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage plus 22 (4d10) lightning damage.
actions.name: Lightning Sword

actions.description: 18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.
actions.name: Hailstone

actions.description: 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage.
actions.name: Slam

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone
name: Scion of Stronmaus [BGG]
resistances: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby

specialTraits.description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)

specialTraits.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
